message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000.
I'm really interested in the product, but $10000 is a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $7000?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. I can see the value of the product is worth $8000 to you, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $9000 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $6500?
